items.sentence: Tom wondered why Mary didn\'t tell him about it.
Tom couldn\'t speak French when I first met him.
I can speak French and I can also speak English.
I could not accept that my wife was really dead.
Tom didn\'t seem to understand anything we said.
Tom doesn\'t care about what other people think.
Tom doesn\'t know how much the ticket will cost.
Tom doesn\'t know what this is called in French.
Tom counted the money before handing it to Mary.
I recognize him, but I don\'t remember his name.
